article: Henry was born in a small town . His father has a factory . One night the man drank too much and drove his car home . On his way he drove fast and suddenly his car fell into the river and he died in the accident . The old man left his son much money and the factory . But the man spent all the money in nearly three years and at last he had to sell the factory for food and clothes . Another three years passed and he wanted to find work but he could n ' t do anything . Nobody would use a man like him . The young man thought and thought . At last he found a way . He began to beg from door to door . Most people in the town knew him well and few of them had a pity on him . So he was often hungry . He had to leave the town and came to Toronto . In the city he began to pretend that he could n ' t speak . So he could beg some money and food . One day Henry was begging by the station when he met Mr . Cook , one of his father ' s friends . The man asked , " How long have you been dumb , Henry ? " The sudden question made the young man burst out , " since I was born ! "
